abstract: An article last Sunday about the departure of Sallie L.. Krawcheck, who led the global wealth management division at Citigroup, misstated the surname of the chief executive of AllianceBernstein, the investment management firm. He is Lewis Sanders, not Saunders.
snippet: An article last Sunday about the departure of Sallie L.. Krawcheck, who led the global wealth management division at Citigroup, misstated the surname of the chief executive of AllianceBernstein, the investment management firm. He is Lewis Sanders,...
lead_paragraph: An article last Sunday about the departure of Sallie L.. Krawcheck, who led the global wealth management division at Citigroup, misstated the surname of the chief executive of AllianceBernstein, the investment management firm. He is Lewis Sanders, not Saunders.
